verses.roman:
adbhuta, ananta, pūrṇa mora madhurimā
tri-jagate ihāra keha nāhi pāya sīmā

synonyms: adbhuta—wonderful; ananta—unlimited; pūrṇa—full; mora—My; madhurimā—sweetness; tri-jagate—in the three worlds; ihāra—of this; keha—someone; nāhi—not; pāya—obtains; sīmā—limit.
translation: "My sweetness is wonderful, infinite and full. No one in the three worlds can find its limit.
